Package adrenaline.client

Class RMIHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.client.RMIHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionHandler
    public class RMIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionHandler
    The RMI Handler class implements ConnectionHandler, For Rmi connect with server send message from client to server,and received the return value

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RMIHandler​(java.lang.String serverIP, int port, GameController gameController)
      The constructor of this class and it try to getRegistry rmi connect with game server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIHandler

        public RMIHandler​(java.lang.String serverIP,
                  int port,
                  GameController gameController)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        The constructor of this class and it try to getRegistry rmi connect with game server.
        Parameters:
        serverIP - The server ip address
        port - The port value, Initial value for RMI is 1099
        gameController - The reference of current gameController
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If IO problem occur,it will throws IOException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - If Rmi bound problem occur,it will throws IOException

      • selectFinalFrenzyAction

        public void selectFinalFrenzyAction​(int action)
        To send selection final frenzy action from client terminal to server terminal

        The action index range depending on the mode In mode 0, action index from 0 to 2 In mode 1, action index from 0 to 1

        Specified by:
        selectFinalFrenzyAction in interface ConnectionHandler
        Parameters:
        action - The action index range depending on the mode from 0 to 1(or 2)
